  • Uses of KeyHandler in backgrounds

    Methods in backgrounds with parameters of type KeyHandler
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    GameOver.update(KeyHandler keys, HUD hud)
    called by gamePanel's method update, manages the movement of the pointer and triggers the setLevel method in gamePanel and hud based on when pressed enter on keyboard
    void
    Password.update(KeyHandler keys, HUD hud)
    called by gamePanel's method update, manages the movement of the pointer and triggers gameOver's method passwordValid when pressed enter and based on the return sets the level
    void
    Title.update(KeyHandler keys)
    called by gamePanel's method update, manages the movement of the pointer and triggers gamePanel's method setLevel based on when pressed enter
